EnergyPrice.description: EnergyPrice represents a current energy commodity price from EIA.

name.description: Human-readable name (e.g., "WTI Crude Oil", "Henry Hub Natural Gas").

priceAt.description: Price date, as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

Error.description: Error is returned when a handler encounters an error. It contains a simple error message that the developer can customize.

message.description: Error message (e.g., 'user not found', 'database connection failed')

FearGreedHistoryEntry.description: FearGreedHistoryEntry is a single day's Fear & Greed index reading.

FearGreedSignal.description: FearGreedSignal tracks the Crypto Fear & Greed index.

FieldViolation.description: FieldViolation describes a single validation error for a specific field.

description.description: Human-readable description of the validation violation (e.g., 'must be a valid email address', 'required field missing')

field.description: The field path that failed validation (e.g., 'user.email' for nested fields). For header validation, this will be the header name (e.g., 'X-API-Key')

FlowStructureSignal.description: FlowStructureSignal compares BTC vs QQQ 5-day returns.

FredObservation.description: FredObservation represents a single data point from a FRED economic series.

FredSeries.description: FredSeries represents a FRED time series with metadata.

GetEnergyPricesRequest.description: GetEnergyPricesRequest specifies which energy commodities to retrieve.

items.description: Optional commodity filter. Empty returns all tracked commodities.

GetFredSeriesRequest.description: GetFredSeriesRequest specifies which FRED series to retrieve.

limit.description: Maximum number of observations to return. Defaults to 120.

GetFredSeriesResponse.description: GetFredSeriesResponse contains the requested FRED series data.

GetMacroSignalsRequest.description: GetMacroSignalsRequest requests the current macro signal dashboard.

GetMacroSignalsResponse.description: GetMacroSignalsResponse contains the full macro signal dashboard with 7 signals and verdict.

totalCount.description: Total number of evaluated signals (excluding UNKNOWN).

unavailable.description: True when upstream data is unavailable (fallback result).

HashPowerSignal.description: HashPowerSignal tracks Bitcoin hash power momentum.

change30d.description: Hash power change over 30 days as percentage.

LiquiditySignal.description: LiquiditySignal tracks JPY 30d rate of change as a liquidity proxy.

value.description: JPY 30d ROC percentage, absent if unavailable.

ListWorldBankIndicatorsRequest.description: ListWorldBankIndicatorsRequest specifies filters for retrieving World Bank data.

year.description: Optional year filter. Defaults to latest available.

ListWorldBankIndicatorsResponse.description: ListWorldBankIndicatorsResponse contains World Bank indicator data.

items.description: Last 30 QQQ close prices for sparkline.

MacroRegimeSignal.description: MacroRegimeSignal compares QQQ vs XLP 20-day rate of change.

MacroSignals.description: MacroSignals contains all 7 individual signal computations.

MiningCostSignal.description: MiningCostSignal estimates mining profitability from BTC price thresholds.

PaginationRequest.description: PaginationRequest specifies cursor-based pagination parameters for list endpoints.

cursor.description: Opaque cursor for fetching the next page. Empty string for the first page.

pageSize.description: Maximum number of items to return per page (1 to 100).

PaginationResponse.description: PaginationResponse contains pagination metadata returned alongside list results.

nextCursor.description: Cursor for fetching the next page. Empty string indicates no more pages.

totalCount.description: Total count of items matching the query, if known. Zero if the total is unknown.

TechnicalTrendSignal.description: TechnicalTrendSignal evaluates BTC price vs moving averages and VWAP.

ValidationError.description: ValidationError is returned when request validation fails. It contains a list of field violations describing what went wrong.

WorldBankCountryData.description: WorldBankCountryData represents a World Bank indicator value for a country.

post.description: GetEnergyPrices retrieves current energy commodity prices from EIA.
GetFredSeries retrieves time series data from the Federal Reserve Economic Data.
GetMacroSignals computes 7 macro signals from 6 upstream sources with BUY/CASH verdict.
ListWorldBankIndicators retrieves development indicator data from the World Bank.
